title: PERMISSIONS: Bulk Transfers Widget
custom_steps:
AC:

* New EBIS-BULKTRANS-WIDGET-EDITOR permission will be created
** New permission will be added to the following roles:
*** Minor Transactions BOC Admin
*** Minor Transactions Club Admin

title: As an EBIS User, I want to be able to export Tx from the Bulk Transfers widget
custom_steps:
AC:

* To the far right of each row on the Bulk Transfers widget will be a Ã¢â‚¬Å“PrintÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ button that will become clickable upon all required fields being filled in
* Selecting to Print will work exactly as regular Transfer Transactions:
** Export a Notice of Disposition as a PDF file with all of the relevant information filled in
* Example Attached

title: As an EBIS User, I want to be able to Transfer Players using the Bulk Transfers widget
custom_steps:
AC:

Here are the actions of the columns on the widget:
Org - Editable by BOC Only
Autofilled/Not editable for Club users
*** Dropdown
** Player
*** Search Bar
**** Only players of the selected Org can populate
**** Upon searching and selecting a player, the Player ID, Pos, and Current Club columns will autofill with the playerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s information
*** Required
** Player ID
*** Autofilled from Player
*** Not editable
** Pos
*** Autofilled from Player
*** Not editable
** Roster Status
*** Autofilled from Player
*** Not editable
** Current Club
*** Autofilled from Player
*** If a player is currently pending to be on a club, autofill the pending club in green text
*** Not editable
** Transfer To
*** Dropdown
*** Population: All MJ & MN Clubs within the selected Org excluding the Current Club
*** Required
** Assignment Date
*** Calendar selection
*** Default to todayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s date
*** Required
** Authorized Signatory
*** Dropdown
*** Population: All known auth sigs for the selected Org
**** Default: None
* Users will be able to add multiple rows of players on the widget for bulk transfers
* At the bottom of the widget, there will be a Ã¢â‚¬Å“SubmitÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ button
* After selecting to Ã¢â‚¬Å“Submit,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ the rows will disappear from the widget
** After submitting, the system should run rule checks for the selected player and surface any errors/warnings that may block the transfer from being successfully completed
* On the backend, save each row as it is edited on the widget

title: As an EBIS User, I want a new "Bulk Transfers" widget
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3921674309/Data+Discovery+-+Bulk+Transfers+Widget|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3921674309/Data+Discovery+-+Bulk+Transfers+Widget|smart-link] 

AC:

* There will be a new tab on the Rosters dashboard called Ã¢â‚¬Å“Roster DetailsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½
* On the screen, will be a new widget labeled Ã¢â‚¬Å“Bulk TransfersÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½
* This new widget will be a blank widget by default
* The table should have the following columns:
** Org
** Player
** Player ID
** Pos
** Roster Status
** Current Club
** Transfer To
** Assignment Date
** Authorized Signatory
* At the bottom right of the Bulk Transfers widget, there will be an Ã¢â‚¬Å“Add RowÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ button
* Selecting this button will prompt a new row to appear
* There should be a trashcan icon on the far left of each row to delete the row if needed
